recipe.title: Strawberry Ice Cubes
ingredients: 1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice, or to taste
instructions: Purée all ingredients in a blender until smooth; strain through a fine-mesh sieve into a large glass measure. Freeze in ice-cube trays until solid, at least 4 hours. Add 1 cube to a glass of sparkling wine; 2 or 3 cubes for a glass of lemonade.
